My recommend for ALL players who love avtions games

Cheaters everywhere. Valve doesnt ban anyone. If you have a knife in your invventory people will add you constantly to try and scam you out of it. The new "operation" is actually a battle pass. Seems to be getting worse over time. Play this game if you want to hate yourself and question your existence

10/10 would kill myself again.

For a guy who usually just played S&D in Call of Duty, the competitive mode came natural to me.
That's basically all I play, and I love it!

If you want salt, just go to the market and buy a bag of salt. 
You are gonna be more happy in youre live. 
If you really want to play this game, learn the language Russian.
If you are silver 1 than you are the best player in the game. Remember that forever!
Playing when you are drunk is better and is recommended.
